name: Kindred Spirit (Chel Spaniel)
description:
READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING GAME:

This game requires the Quest engine to be installed before you can play it. You can grab a free download of it for Windows here: https://textadventures.co.uk/quest/desktop

Second game from me, starring a lively Pikachu man and his ghostly Mimikyu twin brother. Won't you help lay a nervous young lad to rest?

CONTENT WARNINGS:

  • Death Mention

[ This game is set within the Modern Fantasy character universe. ]
